section.title: Overview
section.p: The Oxygen AI Positron Assistant add-on provides an advanced solution that utilizes artificial intelligence platforms to support technical documentation writers throughout their content creation process. By leveraging the power of AI platforms, AI Positron streamlines and enhances the writing experience by providing lots of useful AI based actions, the possibility to chat and refine responses and lots of customization possibilities for defining new custom AI actions and behaviors.
This add-on works through a subscription-based model using the Oxygen Positron Service platform, which in turn uses the OpenAI API and functionality.

Users can create new subscription accounts or authenticate using their existing Google or Github accounts. The first subscription month is free and a monthly subscription can be purchased to receive a number of credits each month.
The terms of use for the service can be found here.
